name: Realm

values.name: updateState
values.comment: Given an update function and an outgoing port to send your Elm model into JavaScript, returns a new update function which automatically sends the new model to JavaScript after running the update.
values.type: (msg -> model -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )) -> Realm.SendPort msg model -> msg -> model -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )
